locale.name: en_US
locale.message: MARC
This schema supports the MARC metadata format.
Leader
This is the record leader.
Control Number
(001) Contains the control number assigned by the organization creating, using, or distributing the record
Control Number Identifier
(003) Contains the MARC code for the agency whose system control number is contained in field 001 (Control Number)
Latest Transaction
(005) Date and time of latest transaction
Additional Material Characteristics
(006) Provides for coding information about special aspects of the item being cataloged that cannot be coded in field 008 (Fixed-Length Data Elements)
Physical Description
(007) Contains special information about the physical characteristics in a coded form
Fixed-Length Data Elements
(008) Provides coded information about the record as a whole or about special aspects of the 1XX heading or 4XX/5XX tracing fields.
Control Number
(010) Library of Congress Control Number
Patent Control Information
(013) Information used to control patent documents
National Biography Number
(015) The bibliography entry number for cataloging information that is derived from a national bibliography
National Bibliographic Agency Control Number
(016) Unique numbers that have been assigned to a record by a national bibliographic agency other than the Library of Congress
Copyright or Legal Deposit Number
(017) The copyright registration or legal deposit number for an item that was acquired by copyright or legal deposit
ISBN
(020) The ISBN assigned to a monographic publication by designated agencies in each country participating in the program
ISSN
(022) The ISSN, a unique identification number assigned to a continuing resource
Other Standard Identifier
(024) A standard number or code published on an item which cannot be accommodated in another field
Overseas Acquisition Number
(025) A number assigned by the Library of Congress to an item that was acquired through one of its overseas acquisition programs
Fingerprint Identifier

(026) Used to assist in the identification of antiquarian books by recording information comprising groups of characters taken from specified positions on specified pages of the book, in accordance with the principles laid down in various published guidelines
STRN

(027) The Standard Technical Report Number assigned to a technical report. The assignment of STRNs is coordinated by the National Technical Information Service (NTIS), which also maintains an assignment registry
Publisher Number
(028) The formatted number used for sound recordings, printed music, and videorecordings
Coden Designation
(030) The CODEN designation for a bibliographic title
Musical Incipits Information
(031) Coded data representing the musical incipit for music using established notation schemes that employ ordinary ASCII symbols
Postal Registration Number
(032) The number assigned to a publication for which the specified postal service permits the use of a special mailing class privilege
Date/Time & Place
(033) Formatted date/time and/or coded place of creation, capture, or broadcast associated with an event or the finding of a naturally occurring object
Coded Cartographic Mathematical Data
(034) The coded form of the mathematical data contained in field 255 (Mathematical Data Area) of the bibliographic record
System Control Number

(035) A control number of a system other than the one whose control number is contained in field 001 (Control Number), field 010 (Library of Congress Control Number) or field 016 (National Bibliographic Agency Control Number)
Original Study Number For Computer Data Files
(036) The original study number assigned by the producer of the computer file. The introductory phrase Original study: may be generated based on the field tag
Source Of Acquisition
(037) Information needed to order the item or its reproduction
Record Content Licensor
(038) Contains the MARC code of the organization that licenses the intellectual property rights to the data contained in the record, such as with contractual arrangements
Cataloging Source

(040) The MARC code for or the name of the organization(s) that created the original bibliographic record, assigned MARC content designation and transcribed the record into machine-readable form, or modified (except for the addition of holdings symbols) an existing MARC record
Language Code
(041) Codes for languages associated with an item when the language code in field 008/35-37 of the record is insufficient to convey full information
Authentication Code
(042) One or more codes that indicate an authentication center has reviewed a national database record. The codes are associated with specifically designated authentication agencies
Geographic Area Code
(043) Geographic area codes associated with an item. The source of the code in subfield $a is the MARC Code List for Geographic Areas
Country of Publishing

(044) Codes for the country of producer when the code in field 008/15-17 (Place of publication, production, or execution) of the record is insufficient to convey full information for an item produced in more than one country
Time Period of Content
(045) A time period code and/or a formatted time period associated with an item
Special Coded Dates

(046) The date of item information that cannot be recorded in 008/06-14 (Type of date/Publication status, Date 1, Date 2) because such information involves one or more Before Common Era (B.C.) dates, incorrect dates, dates when resources have been modified or created, and date spans when resources are valid
Form of Musical Composition Code

(047) The specific codes that indicate the form of composition of printed and manuscript music and musical sound recordings when more than one code applies to the work (008/18-19, Form of composition, code mu)
Number of Musical Instruments or Voices Code
(048) A two-character, alphabetic code that indicates the medium of performance for a musical group
Library of Congress Call Number
(050) A classification or call number that is taken from Library of Congress Classification or LC Classification Additions and Changes
Library of Congress Copy, Issue, Offprint Statement
(051) Information added to a bibliographic record by LC that relates to copies, issues, and/or offprints of the described item that are in its collections
Geographic Classification
(052) A code for the main geographic area and any applicable subareas associated with the item
Classification Numbers Assigned in Canada
(055) A classification or call number that is assigned by the Library and Archives Canada or a contributing Canadian library
National Library of Medicine Call Number

(060) A classification or call number that is taken from National Library of Medicine Classification schedules QS-QZ and W or from Library of Congress Classification schedules as used by NLM for peripheral and related topics
National Library of Medicine Copy Statement
(061) Information added to a bibliographic record by NLM that relates to second copies or sets of the described item that are in its collections
Character Sets Present
(066) Information that indicates that the character set present in a record is other than ISO 10646 (or Unicode).
National Agricultural Library Call Number
(070) A classification or call number that is assigned by the National Agricultural Library
National Agricultural Library Copy Statement
(071) Information added to a bibliographic record by NAL that relates to second copies or sets of the described item that are in its collections
Subject Category Code
(072) A code for the subject category that is associated with the described item
GPO Item Number
(074) A number assigned by the U.S. Government Printing Office to publications to manage their distribution within its Depository Library System
Universal Decimal Classification Number
(080) A number taken from the Universal Decimal Classification scheme
Dewey Decimal Classification Number
(082) The classification number is taken from Dewey Decimal Classification and Relative Index, the Abridged Dewey Decimal Classification and Relative Index, and electronic updates to either edition
Other Classification Number

(084) A classification number from a scheme not covered by one of the other number fields. The field should not be used for classification numbers assigned from a source for which a subfield $2 source of number code would not be assigned
Government Document Classification Number
(086) The classification number assigned to documents by designated agencies in countries that have a government documents classification program
Report Number
(088) A report number that is not a Standard Technical Report Number
Personal Name
(100) A personal name used as a main entry in a bibliographic record
Corporate Name
(110) A corporate name used as a main entry in a bibliographic record
Meeting Name
(111) A meeting name used as a main entry in a bibliographic record
Uniform Title
(130) A uniform title used as a main entry in a bibliographic record
Abbreviated Title
(210) Contains title as abbreviated for indexing or identification
Key Title
(222) A unique title for a continuing resource that is assigned in conjunction with an ISSN recorded in field 022 by national centers under the auspices of the ISSN Network
Uniform Title
(240) The uniform title for an item when the bibliographic description is entered under a main entry field that contains a personal (field 100), corporate (110), or meeting (111) name
Translation of Title By Cataloging Agency

(242) A translation of the title proper that is made by the cataloger when the translated title does not appear as a parallel title on the item. For a note, the introductory phrase Title translated: may be generated based on the field tag for display
Collective Uniform Title
(243) A generic title that is constructed by the cataloger to collect works by a prolific author. The brackets that customarily enclose a collective uniform title are not carried in the MARC record
Title Statement
(245) The title and statement of responsibility area of the bibliographic description of a work
Varying Form of Title

(246) A form of the title appearing on different parts of an item or a portion of the title proper, or an alternative form of the title when the form differs significantly from the title contained in field 245
Former Title
(247) A former title proper when one cataloging record represents several titles associated with an entity
Edition Statement
(250) Information relating to the edition of a work as determined by applicable cataloging rules
Musical Presentations Statement
(254) A description of the format of an edition of a work of printed or manuscript music that may differ from the format of another edition of the same work
Cartographic Mathematical Data
(255) Mathematical data that is associated with map material, including celestial charts. This data may also be coded in field 034 (Coded Mathematical Data)
Computer File Characteristics
(256) Characteristics of a computer file, such as the type of file, the number of records or statements
Country of Producing Entity for Archival Films
(257) The name or abbreviation of the name of the country where the principal offices of the producing entity of a moving image work are located
Philatelic Issue Data

(258) Stamps, postal stationery and all other documents created and/or used to signify pre-payment or payment due for postal services; stamps or other labels resembling the material described above, but which have no postal value; cancellations or other marks created and/or used by a postal administration to show evidence of postal usage; material bearing one or more of the items described above
Publication, Distribution, Etc.
(260) Information relating to the publication, printing, distribution, issue, release, or production of a wor
Projected Publication Date
(263) The projected date of publication used in bibliographic records for works that have not yet been published
Address
(270) Contains an address (as well as electronic access data such as telephone, fax, TTY, etc. numbers) associated with a bibliographic item
Physical Description
(300) A physical description of the described item, including its extent, dimensions, and such other physical details as a description of any accompanying materials and unit type and size
Playing Time
(306) Six numeric characters, in the pattern hhmmss, that represent the playing time for a sound recording or the stated duration of performance of printed or manuscript music
Hours, etc.
(307) Chronological information identifying the days and/or times an item is available or accessible
Current Publication Frequency
(310) The current stated publication frequency of either an item or an update to an item
Former Publication Frequency
(321) The former frequency of either an item or an update to an item when a current frequency is contained in field 310
Physical Medium
(340) Physical description information for an item that requires technical equipment for its use or an item that has special conservation or storage needs
Geospatial Reference Data
(342) A description of the frame of reference for the coordinates in a data set
Planar Coordinate Data
(343) Information about the coordinate system developed on a planar surface
Organization and Arrangement of Materials
(351) Describes the organization and arrangement of a collection of items
Digital Graphic Representation
(352) A description of the method of referencing and the mechanism used to represent graphic information in a data set
Security Classification Control
(355) Specifics pertaining to the security classification associated with the document, title, abstract, contents note, and/or the author
Originator Dissemination Control
(357) Specifics pertaining to originator (i.e., author, producer) control of dissemination of the material in hand
Dates of Publication and/or Sequential Designation
(362) Contains the beginning/ending date(s) of an item and/or the sequential designations used on each part
Trade Price
(365) Contains the current price of an item or records the special export price of an item in any currency
Trade Availability Information
(366) Contains detailed information relating to the availability of items from publishers
Series Statement/Added Entry Title
(440) A series statement consisting of a series title alone
Series Statement
(490) A series statement for which no series added entry is traced or for which the added entry is traced in one of the 800-830 fields in a form different from the form contained in field 490
General Note
(500) General information for which a specialized 5XX note field has not been defined
With Note
(501) A note that is used when more than one bibliographic work is contained in a physical item at the time of publishing, release, issue, or execution
Dissertation Note
(502) The designation of an academic dissertation or thesis and the institution to which it was presented
Bibliography, etc. Note
(504) Information on the presence of one or more bibliographies, discographies, filmographies, and/or other bibliographic references in a described item or in accompanying material
Formatted Contents Note
(505) The titles of separate works or parts of an item or the table of contents
Restrictions on Access Note
(506) Information on the restrictions that govern access to or the limited distribution of the described materials
Scale Note for Graphic Material
(507) For visual materials, this field contains the scale of architectural drawings or three-dimensional artifacts
Creation/Production Credits Note
(508) The names of the persons (other than members of the cast) or organizations who participated in the artistic or technical production of the work
Citation/References Note
(510) Citations or references to published bibliographic descriptions, reviews, abstracts, or indexes of the content of the described item
Participant or Performer Note
(511) The names of the participants, players, narrators, presenters, or performers
Type of Report and Period Covered Note
(513) Information on the type of report and the period covered by the report
Data Quality Note
(514) Provides a general assessment of the quality of the data set constituting the item
Numbering Peculiarities Note
(515) An unformatted description of irregularities and peculiarities in numbering or publishing patterns, report year coverage, revised editions, and/or issuance in parts
Type of Computer File or Data Note
(516) A general descriptor that characterizes a file (e.g., text, computer program, numeric)
Date/Time and Place of an Event Note
(518) Textual information on the date/time and/or place of creation, capture, or broadcast associated with an event or the finding of a naturally occurring object
Summary, etc.
(520) Unformatted information that describes the scope and general contents of the materials
Target Audience Note
(521) Information that identifies the specific audience or intellectual level for which the content of the described item is considered appropriate
Geographic Coverage Note
(522) Information on the geographic coverage of the described material (usually survey material)
Preferred Citation of Described Materials Note
(524) The format of the citation of the described materials that is preferred by the custodian
Supplement Note
(525) Information on the existence of supplements or special issues (usually unnamed) that are neither cataloged as separate records nor recorded in field 770 (Supplement/Special Issue Entry)
Study Program Information Note
(526) A note giving the name of a study program which uses the title described in the record
Additional Physical Form Available Note
(530) Availability information concerning a different physical format in which the described item is available
Reproduction Note
(533) Descriptive data for a reproduction of an original item when the main portion of the bibliographic record describes the original item and the data differ
Original Version Note
(534) Descriptive data for an original item when the main portion of the bibliographic record describes a reproduction of that item and the data differ
Location of Originals/Duplicates Note

(535) The name and address of the repository that has custody of the original or a duplicate copy of the described material when either is housed in a repository different from that of the material being described
Funding Information Note
(536) Contract, grant, and/or project numbers when the described material is the result of a funded project. Information concerning the sponsor or funding agency also may be included
System Details Note

(538) Technical information about an item, such as the presence or absence of certain kinds of codes; or the physical characteristics of a computer file, such as recording densities, parity, blocking factors, etc.
Terms Governing Use and Reproduction Note
(540) Terms governing the use of the described materials (e.g., copyrights, film rights, trade rights) after access has been provided
Immediate Source of Acquisition Note
(541) Information on the immediate source of acquisition of the described materials. The field is used primarily for original or historical items or other archival collections
Location of Other Archival Materials Note
(544) The name and address of the custodian of materials that, at a previous time, have been part of the same collection or record group as the described materials
Biographical or Historical Data
(545) Biographical information about an individual or historical information about an institution or an event used as the main entry of the bibliographic record for the described materials
Language Note
(546) Textual information on the language of the described materials
Former Title Complexity Note
(547) A description of the complex relationship between former titles proper whenever an intelligible note cannot be generated from the data in field 247 (Former Title)
Issuing Body Note
(550) Information about the current and former issuing bodies of a continuing resource
Entity and Attribute Information Note
(552) A description of the information content of the data set, including the entity types, their attributes, and the domains from which attribute values may be assigned
Cumulative Index/Finding Aids Note
(555) Information on the availability of cumulative indexes for continuing resources or finding aids and similar control materials for archival and manuscripts control and visual materials
Information About Documentation Note
(556) Information about the documentation of a file, e.g., codebooks that explain the content and use of the file
Ownership and Custodial History

(561) A copy-specific field that contains information concerning the ownership and custodial history of the described materials from the time of their creation to the time of their accessioning, including the time at which individual items or group of items were first brought together in their current arrangement or collation
Copy and Version Identification Note
(562) Information that distinguishes the copy or version of materials held by an archive or manuscript repository when more than one copy or version exists or could exist
Binding Information
(563) Intended primarily for use with antiquarian materials, rare books and other special collections
Case File Characteristics Note
(565) Information on the content, characteristics, and/or the number of cases or variables making up a case file or a database
Methodology Note
(567) Information on significant methodological characteristics of the material, such as the algorithm, sampling procedures, or validation characteristics
Linking Entry Complexity Note
(580) A description of the complex relationship between the described item and other items when an intelligible note cannot be generated from data in the linking entry fields 760-787
Publications About Described Materials Note
(581) A citation to or information about a publication that is a study or analysis of the described materials
Action Note
(583) Contains information about processing, reference, and preservation actions
Accumulation and Frequency Use Note
(584) Information on the rates of accumulation (for continuing, open-ended accessions) and/or the rate of reference use of the described materials
Exhibitions Note
(585) A copy-specific field that contains a citation to an exhibition where the described materials have been shown
Awards Note
(586) Information on awards associated with the described item
Subject Added Entry - Personal Name
(600) A subject added entry in which the entry element is a personal name
Subject Added Entry - Corporate Name
(610) A subject added entry in which the entry element is a corporate name
Subject Added Entry - Meeting Name
(611) A subject added entry in which the entry element is a meeting name
Subject Added Entry - Uniform Title
(630) A subject added entry in which the entry element is a uniform title
Subject Added Entry - Chronological Term
(648) A subject added entry in which the entry element is a chronological term
Subject Added Entry - Topical Term
(650) A subject added entry in which the entry element is a topical term
Subject Added Entry - Geographic Name
(651) A subject added entry in which the entry element is a geographic name
Uncontrolled Index Term
(653) An index term added entry that is not constructed by standard subject heading/thesaurus-building conventions
Subject Added Entry - Faceted Topical Terms
(654) A topical subject constructed from a faceted vocabulary
Index Term - Genre/Form
(655) Terms indicating the genre, form, and/or physical characteristics of the materials being described
Index Term - Occupation
(656) An index term that is descriptive of the occupation reflected in the contents of the described materials
Index Term - Function
(657) An index term that is descriptive of the activity or function that generated the described materials
Index Term - Curriculum Objective
(658) Index terms denoting curriculum or course-of-study objectives applicable to the content of the described materials
Added Entry - Personal Name
(700) An added entry in which the entry element is a personal name
Added Entry - Corporate Name
(710) An added entry in which the entry element is a corporate name
Added Entry - Meeting Name
(711) An added entry in which the entry element is a meeting name
Added Entry - Uncontrolled Name
(720) An added entry in which the name is not controlled in an authority file or list
Added Entry - Uniform Title
(730) Contains a related or an analytical title that is controlled by an authority file or list
Added Entry - Uncontrolled Related/Analytical Title
(740) Contains related or analytical titles that are not controlled through an authority file or list
Added Entry - Hierarchical Place Name
(752) An added entry in which the entry element is a hierarchical form of place name that is related to a particular attribute of the described item, e.g., the place of publication for a rare book
System Details Access to Computer Files
(753) Information on the technical aspects of a computer file and any accompanying material that may be used to select and arrange the record with other records in a printed index
Added Entry - Taxonomic Identification
(754) An added entry in which the entry element is the taxonomic name or category associated with the described item
Main Series Entry
(760) Information concerning the related main series when the target item is a subseries (vertical relationship)
Subseries Entry
(762) Information concerning a related subseries when the target item is a main series or a parent subseries (vertical relationship)
Original Language Entry
(765) Information concerning the publication in its original language when the target item is a translation (horizontal relationship)
Translation Entry
(767) Information concerning the publication in some other language other than the original when the target item is in the original language or is another translation (horizontal relationship)
Supplement/Special Issue Entry
(770) Information concerning the supplement or special issue associated with the target item but cataloged and/or input as a separate record (vertical relationship)
Supplement Parent Entry
(772) Information concerning the related parent record when the target item is a single issue, supplement or special issue (vertical relationship) of the parent item
Host Item Entry
(773) Information concerning the host item for the constituent unit described in the record (vertical relationship)
Constituent Unit Entry
(774) Information concerning a constituent unit associated with a larger bibliographic unit (vertical relationship)
Other Edition Entry
(775) The entry for another available edition of the target item (horizontal relationship)
Additional Physical Form Entry
(776) Information concerning another available physical form of the target item (horizontal relationship)
Issued With Entry
(777) Information concerning the publication that is separately cataloged but that is issued with or included in the target item (horizontal relationship)
Preceding Entry
(780) Information concerning the immediate predecessor of the target item (chronological relationship)
Succeeding Entry
(785) Information concerning the immediate successor to the target item (chronological relationship)
Data Source Entry
(786) Information pertaining to a data source to which the described item is related
Nonspecific Relationship Entry
(787) Information concerning the work related to the target item when the relationship does not fit any of those defined in fields 760-785
Series Added Entry - Corporate Name
(810) An author/title series added entry in which the author portion is a corporate name
Series Added Entry - Meeting Name
(811) An author/title series added entry in which the author portion is a meeting name
Series Added Name - Uniform Title
(830) A series added entry consisting of a series title alone
Holdings Coded Data Values
(841) When holdings data are embedded in a bibliographic record, this field contains certain coded information that would apply to the holdings information if it were in a separate holdings record.
Textual Physical Form Designator
(842) A textual designation of the physical medium, form, or type of material of the item
Reproduction Note
(843) A description of the reproduction aspects of the bibliographic item when some or all of the holdings is a reproduction of original materials
Name of Unit
(844) The bibliographic title or a supplied designation describing a basic bibliographic unit, supplementary material, or an index
Terms Governing Use and Reproduction Note
(845) Information about the holding organization's lending and reproduction policy for a bibliographic item that cannot be coded in field 008/20 (Lending policy) or 008/21 (Reproduction policy)
Holding Institution
(850) Information concerning holdings of the described item by the specified institution.
Location
(852) Identifies the organization holding the item or from which it is available
Captions and Pattern - Basic Bibliographic Unit

(853) The caption that is appropriate for each level of enumeration and chronology that is present in a related 863 Enumeration and Chronology Basic Bibliographic Unit field and codes that define the publication pattern of the item
Captions and Pattern - Supplementary Material

(854) The caption that is appropriate for each level of enumeration and chronology that is present in a related 864 Enumeration and Chronology--Supplementary Material field and codes that define the publication pattern of the item
Captions and Pattern - Indexes

(855) The caption that is appropriate for each level of enumeration and chronology that is present in a related 865 Enumeration and Chronology Indexes field and codes that define the publication pattern for the item
Electronic Location and Access
(856) The information needed to locate and access an electronic resource
Enumeration and Chronology - Basic Bibliographical Unit
(863) The enumeration and chronology of a basic bibliographic unit in the holdings of the reporting organization
Enumeration and Chronology - Supplementary Material
(864) The enumeration and chronology of supplementary material that are not separately cataloged in the holdings of the reporting organization
Enumeration and Chronology - Indexes
(865) The enumeration and chronology of indexes that are not separately cataloged in the holdings of the reporting organization
Textual Holdings - Basic Bibliographical Unit
(866) A textual description of the holdings of a basic bibliographic unit in the collections of the reporting organization
Textual Holdings - Supplementary Material
(867) A textual description of the holdings of supplementary material in the collections of the reporting organization
Textual Holdings - Indexes
(868) A textual description of the holdings of indexes in the collections of the reporting organization
Item Information - Basic Bibliographic Unit
(876) Item information about a basic bibliographic unit in the holdings of the reporting organization
Item Information - Supplementary Material
(877) Item information about supplementary material that are not separately cataloged in the holdings of the reporting organization
Item Information - Indexes
(878) Item information about indexes that are not separately cataloged in the holdings of the reporting organization
Alternate Graphic Representation
(880) The fully content-designated representation, in a different script, of another field in the same record
Foreign MARC Information Field
(886) Used when converting foreign MARC records into the MARC format
Non-MARC Information Field
(887) Contains data from non-MARC records for which there are no corresponding MARC 21 fields
